newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SINGAPORE BUNKER FINAL REPORT AND PRICES - AUG 7.
newsitem.headline: SINGAPORE BUNKER FINAL REPORT AND PRICES - AUG 7.

text.p: (DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - The Singapore bunker market fell on lower cargo prices where sellers came out to offer aggressively with one cargo traded at about $2.00 per barrel lower than Wednesday's offered level. An independent sold several 380-cst lots at $105.00 per tonne and a major sold 180-cst at $109.00 per tonne. Traders said the sellers were now more keen to strike a deal on fears of further cuts to cargo prices. -- Singapore Newsroom (65-870-3093)
